item.description:
Green GROUPS and VENDORS will be there!

So will solar and hybrid electric vehicles.

Mandarin-speaking groups who are exhibiting (Mandarin as a first language) include SMCH.

Boston GreenFest 2012 - Day 1 - Thursday, Aug 16   5 pm - 9:30 pm

Boston GreenFest 2012 - Day 2 - Friday, Aug 17        noon - 9:30 pm
Boston GreenFest 2012 - Day 3 - Saturday, Aug 18    11 am - 8 pm
Boston GreenFest 2012 - Day 4 - Sunday, August 19  10 am - 5 pm


Boston GreenFest 2012
Thursday-Saturday, August 16-19, 2012
|Boston City Hall Plaza

This is a HOST-FREE Meetup.  You are free to walk around the exhibits on your own or with friends, but don't expect anyone from this meetup to rendezvous with you are a specific time and place.


Thursday, Aug 16   5 pm - 9:30 pm    (Performers/Food)
Friday, Aug 17        noon - 9:30 pm    (Exhibitors/Food/Vendors/Performers)
Saturday, Aug 18    11 am - 8 pm       (Exhibitors/Food/Vendors/Performers)
Sunday, Aug 19      10 am - 5 pm       (Exhibitors/Food/Vendors)

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group
